column1: inside each polysac bag was another ploysac bag, and inside the inner bag were a large
number of polythene packets which totaled to 248. Field testing of the substance inside
the polythene packets revealed that the powdery substance was Diacetyl Morphine.
The gross weight of the substance detected by the Navy was found to be 273 kg. Later,
the afore-stated 248 packets and the 26 polysac bags (13 polysac bags inside each of
which  were  another  polysac  bag)  were  sealed  and  forwarded  to  the  Government
Analyst through the Magistrates Court. The five  suspects (Accused â€“ Respondents)
were arrested, produced before the learned Magistrate and placed in remand custody.
